basic_text_oarchive.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_TEXT_OARCHIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_TEXT_OARCHIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // basic_text_oarchive.hpp
00011 
00012 // (C) Copyright 2002 Robert Ramey - http://www.rrsd.com . 
00013 // Use, modification and distribution is subject to the Boost Software

00018 
00019 // archives stored as text - note these ar templated on the basic
00020 // stream templates to accommodate wide (and other?) kind of characters
00021 //
00022 // note the fact that on libraries without wide characters, ostream is
00023 // is not a specialization of basic_ostream which in fact is not defined
00024 // in such cases.   So we can't use basic_ostream<OStream::char_type> but rather
00025 // use two template parameters
00026 
00027 #include <cassert>
00028 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00029 #include <boost/serialization/pfto.hpp>
00030 #include <boost/detail/workaround.hpp>
00031 
00032 #include <boost/archive/detail/common_oarchive.hpp>
00033 #include <boost/serialization/string.hpp>
00034 
00035 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00036 
00037 namespace boost {
00038 namespace archive {
00039 
00041 // class basic_text_oarchive 
00042 template<class Archive>
00043 class basic_text_oarchive : 
00044     public detail::common_oarchive<Archive>
00045 {
00046 protected:
00047 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, <= 1300) \
00048 || BOOST_WORKAROUND(__BORLANDC__,BOOST_TESTED_AT(0x560))
00049 public:
00050 #elif defined(BOOST_MSVC)
00051     // for some inexplicable reason insertion of "class" generates compile erro
00052     // on msvc 7.1
00053     friend detail::interface_oarchive<Archive>;
00054 #else
00055     friend class detail::interface_oarchive<Archive>;
00056 #endif
00057     enum {
00058         none,
00059         eol,
00060         space
00061     } delimiter;
00062 
00063     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00064     newtoken();
00065 
00066     void newline(){
00067         delimiter = eol;
00068     }
00069 
00070     // default processing - kick back to base class.  Note the
00071     // extra stuff to get it passed borland compilers
00072     typedef detail::common_oarchive<Archive> detail_common_oarchive;
00073     template<class T>
00074     void save_override(T & t, BOOST_PFTO int){
00075         this->detail_common_oarchive::save_override(t, 0);
00076     }
00077 
00078     // start new objects on a new line
00079     void save_override(const object_id_type & t, int){
00080         this->This()->newline();
00081         // note extra .t to funciton with Borland 5.51 compiler
00082         // and invoke prmitive to underlying value
00083         this->This()->save(t.t);
00084     }
00085 
00086     void save_override(const object_reference_type & t, int){
00087         this->This()->newline();
00088         // note extra .t to funciton with Borland 5.51 compiler
00089         // and invoke prmitive to underlying value
00090         this->This()->save(t.t);
00091     }
00092 
00093     // note the following four overrides are necessary for some borland
00094     // compilers(5.51) which don't handle BOOST_STRONG_TYPE properly.
00095     void save_override(const version_type & t, int){
00096         // note:t.t resolves borland ambguity
00097         const unsigned int x = t.t;
00098         * this->This() << x;
00099     }
00100     void save_override(const class_id_type & t, int){
00101         // note:t.t resolves borland ambguity
00102         const int x = t.t;
00103         * this->This() << x;
00104     }
00105     void save_override(const class_id_reference_type & t, int){
00106         // note:t.t resolves borland ambguity
00107         const int x = t.t;
00108         * this->This() << x;
00109     }
00110 
00111     // text file don't include the optional information 
00112     void save_override(const class_id_optional_type & /* t */, int){}
00113 
00114     void save_override(const class_name_type & t, int){
00115         const std::string s(t);
00116         * this->This() << s;
00117     }
00118 
00119     BOOST_ARCHIVE_OR_WARCHIVE_DECL(void)
00120     init();
00121 
00122     basic_text_oarchive(unsigned int flags) :
00123         detail::common_oarchive<Archive>(flags),
00124         delimiter(none)
00125     {}
00126     ~basic_text_oarchive(){}
00127 };
00128 
00129 } // namespace archive
00130 } // namespace boost
00131 
00132 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pops abi_suffix.hpp pragmas
00133 
00134 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_TEXT_OARCHIVE_HPP
